fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
eu_initiatives:
All topics about competition and economic and financial affairs and especially VAT fraud.  
We have been participating to the following consultation : Exchange of data to combat VAT fraud in the e-commerce
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit:
We are a video games distribution platform registrated in France and targeting the French, German and UK markets. 
We have been offering to download PC video games since 2002, working with more than 110 Publishers / suppliers all around the word.  
Our portal is localized in French : https://fr.gamesplanet.com/, German : https://de.gamesplanet.com/and UK : https://uk.gamesplanet.com/ 
As a french registered company we are paying our VAT to the french administration and Moss. We have been suffering for more than 10 years a high level of damages due to unfair competition with players supposed to be registered in Hong Kong or elsewhere, not paying any VAT in Europe and so able to offer significantly cheaper products.( n)We have done a lot of request to French administration without any success to date.
